channel.title: Broken run for my client
channel.description:
finally thanls to a kind moparscape forum member i have now got a working compiler :D ,but now my run is bad i have 2 runs called 1 ) client with GUI 2 ) client without GUI when i run the client without gui says java is not reconised and this is what it is the 1 without gui [code]@ECHO OFF title Client Runner color 0f java -Xmx1000m client highmem pause [/code] (but i want the one working with GUI
~now the problem... when i run the 1 With GUI the error comes up this is what is inside the run with GUI [code]]@echo off title Client Runner @echo Client @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code] but it just comes up with aload of errors
if you can i help me a would highly appretiate it thank you.

item.title: Broken run for my client
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

[quote=“i scary i, post:2, topic:245918”]@echo off title Dds-speced java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

thats mine. u can try it. also try changing your path for ur run.bat . I hope i helped[/quote]

HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH you need the freakin source to use that law

[quote=“legend-scape, post:4, topic:245918”]try using this,

@ECHO OFF
color 77
title server name here
echo Running server name here
JAVA -Xmx500m client

were it says server name ere put ur server no-ip name there ;D,

hope i helped if it doesent work then god no’s :o[/quote]

Umm i think its a SOURCE hes using, besides he cant just use ANY code, he needs the one specified that came with the source/client

my suggestion, get a new source and/or client

SAME WITH YOU jeremy you need the source

Read full topic

item.title: Broken run for my client
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Try mine @echo off title Runserver java -cp . -Xmx500m server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java" -cp . -Xmx500m server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Broken run for my client
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

try using this,

@ECHO OFF color 77 title server name here echo Running server name here JAVA -Xmx500m client

were it says server name ere put ur server no-ip name there ;D,

hope i helped if it doesent work then god no’s :o

Read full topic

item.title: Broken run for my client
item.dc:creator: @sticky_wicky sticky wicky
item.description:
@sticky_wicky wrote:

finally thanls to a kind moparscape forum member i have now got a working compiler ,but now my run is bad i have 2 runs called
1 ) client with GUI
2 ) client without GUI
when i run the client without gui says java is not reconised
and this is what it is the 1 without gui

@ECHO OFF title Client Runner color 0f java -Xmx1000m client highmem pause
(but i want the one working with GUI

~now the problem… when i run the 1 With GUI the error comes up
this is what is inside the run with GUI

]@echo off title Client Runner @echo Client @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause
but it just comes up with aload of errors

if you can i help me a would highly appretiate it thank you.
